A Psalm<S>4210</S> of Asaph<S>623</S>. God<S>430</S> standeth<S>5324</S> in the congregation<S>5712</S> of the mighty<S>410</S>; he judgeth<S>8199</S> among<S>7130</S> the gods<S>430</S>. <sup>of Asaph: or, for Asaph</sup>
How long will ye judge<S>8199</S> unjustly<S>5766</S>, and accept<S>5375</S> the persons<S>6440</S> of the wicked<S>7563</S>? Selah<S>5542</S>.
Defend<S>8199</S> the poor<S>1800</S> and fatherless<S>3490</S>: do justice<S>6663</S> to the afflicted<S>6041</S> and needy<S>7326</S>. <sup>Defend: Heb. Judge</sup>
Deliver<S>6403</S> the poor<S>1800</S> and needy<S>34</S>: rid<S>5337</S> them out of the hand<S>3027</S> of the wicked<S>7563</S>.
They know<S>3045</S> not, neither will they understand<S>995</S>; they walk<S>1980</S> on in darkness<S>2825</S>: all the foundations<S>4144</S> of the earth<S>776</S> are out of course<S>4131</S>. <sup>out: Heb. moved</sup>
I have said<S>559</S>, Ye are gods<S>430</S>; and all of you are children<S>1121</S> of the most High<S>5945</S>.
But<S>403</S> ye shall die<S>4191</S> like men<S>120</S>, and fall<S>5307</S> like one<S>259</S> of the princes<S>8269</S>.
Arise<S>6965</S>, O God<S>430</S>, judge<S>8199</S> the earth<S>776</S>: for thou shalt inherit<S>5157</S> all nations<S>1471</S>.
